Section: PRIN 1 Annex 1 Non-designated investment business - clients that a firm may treat as an eligible counterparty for the purposes of PRIN
Description: 1 1.1 A  firm  may categorise the following types of  client  as an  eligible counterparty  for the purposes of  PRIN :

Section: PRIN 1 Annex 1 Non-designated investment business - clients that a firm may treat as an eligible counterparty for the purposes of PRIN
Description: (1) a properly constituted government (including a quasi-governmental body or a government agency) of any country or territory;

Section: PRIN 1 Annex 1 Non-designated investment business - clients that a firm may treat as an eligible counterparty for the purposes of PRIN
Description: (2) a central bank or other national monetary authority of any country or territory;

Section: PRIN 1 Annex 1 Non-designated investment business - clients that a firm may treat as an eligible counterparty for the purposes of PRIN
Description: (3) a supranational whose members are either countries or central banks or national monetary authorities;

Section: PRIN 1 Annex 1 Non-designated investment business - clients that a firm may treat as an eligible counterparty for the purposes of PRIN
Description: (4) a State investment body, or a body charged with, or intervening in, the management of the public debt at national level 3 ;

Section: PRIN 1 Annex 1 Non-designated investment business - clients that a firm may treat as an eligible counterparty for the purposes of PRIN
Description: (5) another  firm , or an  overseas financial services institution ;

Section: PRIN 1 Annex 1 Non-designated investment business - clients that a firm may treat as an eligible counterparty for the purposes of PRIN
Description: (6) any  associate  of a  firm  (except an  OPS firm ), or of an  overseas financial services institution , if the  firm  or institution consents;

Section: PRIN 1 Annex 1 Non-designated investment business - clients that a firm may treat as an eligible counterparty for the purposes of PRIN
Description: (7) a  client  when he is classified as an  eligible counterparty  in accordance with 1.2; or

Section: PRIN 1 Annex 1 Non-designated investment business - clients that a firm may treat as an eligible counterparty for the purposes of PRIN
Description: (8) a  recognised investment exchange ,  EU regulated market 5  or  clearing house .

Section: PRIN 1 Annex 1 Non-designated investment business - clients that a firm may treat as an eligible counterparty for the purposes of PRIN
Description: 1.2 A  firm  may classify a  client  (other than another  firm ,  regulated collective investment scheme , or an  overseas financial services institution ) as an  eligible counterparty  for the purposes of  PRIN  under 1.1(7) if:

Section: PRIN 1 Annex 1 Non-designated investment business - clients that a firm may treat as an eligible counterparty for the purposes of PRIN
Description: (1) the  client  at the time he is classified is one of the following:

Section: PRIN 1 Annex 1 Non-designated investment business - clients that a firm may treat as an eligible counterparty for the purposes of PRIN
Description: (a) a  body corporate  (including a  limited liability partnership ) which has (or any of whose  holding companies  or  subsidiaries  has) called up share capital of at least £10 million (or its equivalent in any other currency at the relevant time);

Section: PRIN 1 Annex 1 Non-designated investment business - clients that a firm may treat as an eligible counterparty for the purposes of PRIN
Description: (b) a  body corporate  that meets (or any of whose holding companies or subsidiaries meets) two of the following tests:

Section: PRIN 1 Annex 1 Non-designated investment business - clients that a firm may treat as an eligible counterparty for the purposes of PRIN
Description: (i) a balance sheet total of 12.5 million euros (or its equivalent in any other currency at the relevant time);

Section: PRIN 1 Annex 1 Non-designated investment business - clients that a firm may treat as an eligible counterparty for the purposes of PRIN
Description: (ii) a net turnover of 25 million euros (or its equivalent in any other currency at the relevant time);

Section: PRIN 1 Annex 1 Non-designated investment business - clients that a firm may treat as an eligible counterparty for the purposes of PRIN
Description: (iii) an average number of employees during the year of 250;

Section: PRIN 1 Annex 1 Non-designated investment business - clients that a firm may treat as an eligible counterparty for the purposes of PRIN
Description: (c) [deleted] 4

Section: PRIN 1 Annex 1 Non-designated investment business - clients that a firm may treat as an eligible counterparty for the purposes of PRIN
Description: (d) a  partnership  or unincorporated association which has net assets of at least £10 million (or its equivalent in any other currency at the relevant time) (and calculated, in the case of a limited  partnership , without deducting loans owing to any of the  partners );

Section: PRIN 1 Annex 1 Non-designated investment business - clients that a firm may treat as an eligible counterparty for the purposes of PRIN
Description: (e) a trustee of a trust (other than an  occupational pension scheme ,  SSAS ,  personal pension scheme  or  stakeholder pension scheme ) with assets of at least £10 million (or its equivalent in any other currency), calculated by aggregating the value of the cash and  designated investments  forming part of the trust's assets, but before deducting its liabilities;

Section: PRIN 1 Annex 1 Non-designated investment business - clients that a firm may treat as an eligible counterparty for the purposes of PRIN
Description: (f) a trustee of an  occupational pension scheme  or  SSAS , or a trustee or operator of a  personal pension scheme  or  stakeholder pension scheme  where the  scheme  has (or has had at any time during the previous two years):

Section: PRIN 1 Annex 1 Non-designated investment business - clients that a firm may treat as an eligible counterparty for the purposes of PRIN
Description: (i) at least 50 members; and

Section: PRIN 1 Annex 1 Non-designated investment business - clients that a firm may treat as an eligible counterparty for the purposes of PRIN
Description: (ii) assets under management of not less than £10 million (or its equivalent in any other currency at the relevant time); and

Section: PRIN 1 Annex 1 Non-designated investment business - clients that a firm may treat as an eligible counterparty for the purposes of PRIN
Description: (2) the  firm  has, before commencing business with the  client  on an  eligible counterparty  basis:

Section: PRIN 1 Annex 1 Non-designated investment business - clients that a firm may treat as an eligible counterparty for the purposes of PRIN
Description: (a) advised the  client  in writing that he is being categorised as an  eligible counterparty  for the purposes of  PRIN ;

Section: PRIN 1 Annex 1 Non-designated investment business - clients that a firm may treat as an eligible counterparty for the purposes of PRIN
Description: (b) given a written warning to the  client  that he will lose protections under the  regulatory system ;

Section: PRIN 1 Annex 1 Non-designated investment business - clients that a firm may treat as an eligible counterparty for the purposes of PRIN
Description: (c) for a  client  falling under (1)(a) or (b):

Section: PRIN 1 Annex 1 Non-designated investment business - clients that a firm may treat as an eligible counterparty for the purposes of PRIN
Description: (i) taken reasonable steps to ensure that the written notices required by (a) and (b) have been delivered to a  person  authorised to take such a decision for the  client ; and

Section: PRIN 1 Annex 1 Non-designated investment business - clients that a firm may treat as an eligible counterparty for the purposes of PRIN
Description: (ii) not been notified by the  client  that the  client  objects to being classified as an  eligible counterparty ;

Section: PRIN 1 Annex 1 Non-designated investment business - clients that a firm may treat as an eligible counterparty for the purposes of PRIN
Description: (d) for a  client  falling under (1)(c), (d), (e) or (f):

Section: PRIN 1 Annex 1 Non-designated investment business - clients that a firm may treat as an eligible counterparty for the purposes of PRIN
Description: (i) taken reasonable steps to ensure that the written notices required by (a) and (b) have been delivered to a  person  authorised to take such a decision for the  client ; and

Section: PRIN 1 Annex 1 Non-designated investment business - clients that a firm may treat as an eligible counterparty for the purposes of PRIN
Description: (ii) obtained the  client's  written consent or is otherwise able to demonstrate that consent has been given.
